episodes.title: “My Parents Forced Me To Marry The Cult Leader Age 3” Traumatic Account Of How To Survive A Cult
episodes.description:
Serena Kelley was born into the Children of God in the Philippines in 1983. At three years old, Serena was given to the Supreme Leader David Berg as a child bride by her mother. 

It was in his household that she alleges facing constant mental, physical and sexual abuse and being forced to appear in child pornography videos. 

The group, which was founded in 1968 by Berg, began as a new religious movement focused on spreading the Christian message. 

But, as the decades progressed and the group evolved, it began to attract the attention of the international media with regards to its practices involving children. 

And even after she escaped to the US aged 18 in 2001, it took her years to come to terms with the bottled up trauma from her childhood. 

But in 2017, she began her training to become a Trauma Recovery Specialist, becoming the person she wished she had had when she was looking for help. 

This is her story. 

Click here for more from TalkTV https://talk.tv

If you need any help visit: https://talk.tv/helplines

#cult #cults #survival #survivor
